verbose_text: Here, we have characterized a serendipitously discovered DNA-damage-specific phosphorylation event of VCP (Ser 784) mediated by members of the DDR master kinase family, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase-related kinases (PIKKs).
evidence: phosphorylation event of VCP (Ser 784 ) mediated by members of the DDR master kinase family, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase-related kinases (PIKKs
